about_the_game:
The NORSE race comes with its own official players (Lineman, Berserker, Runner, Thrower, Ulfwerener, Yhetee) along with a couple of star players: Wilhelm Chaney and Icepelt Hammerblow!

Norsemen are homicidal maniacs who love battle and beer! This rolling roadblock may not be the fastest team on the pitch, but with most players benefiting from Block it’s certainly one of the toughest.

The Yhetee is the Norse’s very own walking mountain. It's a special kind of Troll from the northern lands, adapted to the cold, harsh environment in order to survive. Norse team coaches include Yhetees in their Blood Bowl teams thanks to their deadly combination of claws, fierceness, and natural talent for destruction.

The Yhetee is the Norse’s very own walking mountain. It's a special kind of Troll from the northern lands, adapted to the cold, harsh environment in order to survive. Norse team coaches include Yhetees in their Blood Bowl teams thanks to their deadly combination of claws, fierceness, and natural talent for destruction.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7.1, 10.8.1, 10.9.1, 10.10.1
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5 3 GHZ
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI RADEON HD 6970M/NVIDIA GEFORCE GT 650M OR HIGHER
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR ONLINE GAMING AND GAME ACTIVATION

name: Blood Bowl 2 - Norse

subs.option_text: Blood Bowl 2 - Official Expansion + Team Pack - $29.99

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS VISTA/WINDOWS 7/WINDOWS 8
  • Processor: AMD/INTEL DUAL-CORE 2.5 GHZ
  • Memory: 3072 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 768 MB 100% DIRECTX 10 AND SHADERS 4.0 COMPATIBLE ATI RADEON HD 5670/NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 260 OR HIGHER
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DIRECTX COMPATIBLE
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE GAME ACTIVATION *WINDOWS XP NOT SUPPORTED
